action_1.title: Tax breaks for Tech
action_1.description: As a sign of good faith, we will give tax breaks for both European and American companies willing to employ European software engineers. This will help the tech economy greatly, but hurt our public image

action_2.title: Enforce minor language software
action_2.description: Itâ€™s easy enough to find any software in English, and most have other languages like French and Spanish. But the EU should ensure that any software is available in minor languages, from Basque to Hungarian. Some software companies will be unhappy to have to comply.

action_3.title: Praise Silicon Valley
action_3.description: Silicon Valley is bringing our world into the 21st century, and it is crucial that we let Europe stands behind it in this endeavour.

action_4.title: Criticise Silicon Valley
action_4.description: Silicon Valley is bringing our world into the 21st century, and it is crucial that we let Europe stands behind it in this endeavour.

action_7.title: Praise EU
action_7.description: Let the people know that the EU is doing a good job.

action_8.title: Criticise EU
action_8.description: The EU is being too regulatory for us to succeed!
